General.Name: Grimoldi SA
General.Description: Grimoldi S.A. manufacturing, marketing, and distribution of footwear, accessories, and clothing. It offers its products under the Hush Puppies, Vans, The North Face, Kickers, Aldo, Merrell, Caterpillar, a-pie, Stitching, and Grims through its stores, third-party stores, franchises, and online. The company was founded in 1895 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
